title: The Debrief w/ Jocko And Dave Berke #23: Critical Advice for Getting Promoted Above Your Peers
itunes:author: Jocko DEFCOR Network
description:
One day you're a team member, and the next day you are the supervisor. How do you handle that position?



Support this podcast at — https://redcircle.com/jocko-podcast/exclusive-content
